name: HideandSeek
0:
”Alexa, open hide n. seek”
”what are the rules”
”how did you guess that”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide n. seek
des:
Play Hide n. Seek with Alexa. Hide before Alexa counts to Five!

Hide n. Seek is a popular game where all you have to do is hide in your favourite place in the house as Alexa tries to call out the hiding spot. Play this fun game as Alexa, the seeker tries to locate you! how safe is your Hideout?

Tips: Best hiding spots are Under the bed, In the Cupboard, Behind the Door
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
